name: NSPDFPanel.Options
desc: Constants used to configure the contents of a PDF panel.

items.name: static var showsPaperSize: NSPDFPanel.Options
items.desc: The PDF panel shows a menu of paper sizes.

items.name: static var showsOrientation: NSPDFPanel.Options
items.desc: The PDF panel shows the current orientation of the PDF contents, such as landscape or portrait.

items.name: static var requestsParentDirectory: NSPDFPanel.Options
items.desc: The PDF panel doesn’t show a name field; instead, it allows the user to identify a directory in which to save multiple PDF files. If you set this flag, you’re responsible for appending a filename and the "pdf" extension to the resulting URL value in the NSPDFInfo object before proceeding with the creation of the PDF file (or calling the takeSettingsFromPDFInfo method of NSPrintInfo).
